description: Two investigators are examining a room, with one kneeling to photograph details like a broken lamp and scattered debris. Another figure in a trench coat is peering into an open closet, which is inexplicably crammed floor-to-ceiling with numerous ducks. The scene juxtaposes a conventional crime investigation setting with the absurd and surreal discovery of the fowl, creating irony when paired with the cliché statement about the plot's complexity.
caption: "Ahhh ... the plot thickens."
